eu.amidst.core.utils

Interface Vector

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, SufficientStatistics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayVector, CompoundVector, EF_Normal_NormalParents.CompoundVector, KeyCompoundVector

    public interface Vector
    This interface defines some Vector utility methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void copy(Vector vector)
      Copies the input source Vector to this Vector.
      default void divideBy(double val)
      Updates the values of this Vector via dividing its initial values by an input double value.
      default double dotProduct(Vector vector)
      Returns the dot product of this Vector and an input vector, defined as the sum of the pairwise products of the values of the two vectors.
      default boolean equalsVector(Vector vector, double threshold)
      Tests if this Vector is equal to an input vector given a threshold.
      double get(int i)
      Returns the value of the element in a given position i.
      default void multiplyBy(double val)
      Updates the values of this Vector via multiplying its initial values by an input double value.
      void set(int i, double val)
      Sets the value of the element in a given position i to the input double value.
      int size()
      Returns the size.
      default void substract(Vector vector)
      Updates the values of this Vector as a subtraction of the input vector values from its initial values.
      default double sum()
      Returns the sum of all elements.
      default void sum(Vector vector)
      Updates the values of this Vector as a sum of its initial values and the input vector values.
      static Vector sumVector(Vector vec1, Vector vec2)
      Sums two vectors.

      • get

        double get(int i)
        Returns the value of the element in a given position i.
        Parameters:
        i - an int that represents the position.
        Returns:
        a double that represents the extracted value.

      • set

         double val)
        Sets the value of the element in a given position i to the input double value.
        Parameters:
        i - an int that represents the position.
        val - an double value.

        Returns the size.
        Returns:

        Updates the values of this Vector as a sum of its initial values and the input vector values.
        Parameters:
        vector - an input Vector.

      • dotProduct

        default double dotProduct(Vector vector)
        Returns the dot product of this Vector and an input vector, defined as the sum of the pairwise products of the values of the two vectors.
        Parameters:
        vector - an input vector.
        Returns:
        a double that represents the dot product of the two vectors.

      • equalsVector

        default boolean equalsVector(Vector vector,
                             double threshold)
        Tests if this Vector is equal to an input vector given a threshold.
        Parameters:
        vector - an input vector.
        threshold - a threshold.
        Returns:
        true if the two vectors ae equal, false otherwise.

      • sumVector

        static Vector sumVector(Vector vec1,
                        Vector vec2)
        Sums two vectors.
        Parameters:
        vec1 - an input Vector.
        vec2 - a destination Vector.
        Returns:
        the destination vector containing the sum of the two vectors.
